100317
Test: public void testAddDays_int_dstOverlapSummer_addZero() { MutableDateTime test = new MutableDateTime(2011, 10, 30, 2, 30, 0, 0, DateTimeZone.forID("Europe/Berlin")); test.addDays(0); }
Code: public void addDays(final int days) { setMillis(getChronology().days().add(getMillis(), days)); }
